amendment.description: To extend the patent term for the badges of the American Legion, the American Legion Woman's Auxiliary, and the Sons of the American Legion, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4530 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4530 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6385) To extend the patent term for the badges of the American Legion, the American Legion Woman's Auxiliary, and the Sons of the American Legion, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4530 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4530 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Talent.
